short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Deletes all cookies (except for selected domains) and history after chrome closes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically deletes the whole history and all cookies from chrome, except for selected URLs, where cookies and Cache remain. Clean and clear the history after you close your browser.
